StandardQuestions.questionText: Do you find it difficult to concentrate on whatever you're doing?
Do you lose much sleep due to worry?
Do you feel that you are not playing a useful part in things?
Do you find it hard to make decisions about things?
Do you feel constantly under strain?
Do you feel you can't overcome your difficulties?
Are you unable to enjoy your normal day-to-day activities?
Do you find it difficult to face up to your problems?
Are you feeling unhappy and depressed?
Are you losing confidence in yourself?
Do you think of yourself as a worthless person?
Are you not feeling reasonably happy, all things considered?
Do you get scared or panicky for no good reason?
Is everything getting on top of you?
Are you feeling nervous and strung-up all the time?
Are you finding it hard to keep yourself busy and occupied?
Are you taking longer to do things than usual?
Do you feel that you are not doing things well?
Are you unsatisfied with the way you've carried out your tasks?
Do you feel that life is entirely hopeless?
Do you feel that life isn't worth living?
Have you thought of the possibility that you might make away with yourself?
Do you find at times you can't do anything because your nerves are too bad?
Do you find yourself wishing you were dead and away from it all?
Does the idea of taking your own life keep coming into your mind?
Are you unable to enjoy your normal leisure time activities?
Do you find yourself getting agitated?
Are you losing sleep over something?

FollowUpQuestions.questionText: On a scale of 1 to 5, how has your overall emotional well-being been since our last appointment?
How frequently have you experienced feelings of sadness or hopelessness over the past week?
Please rate your sleep quality over the past week.
How often have you felt overwhelmed or stressed by your academic or personal responsibilities in the past week?
On a scale of 1 to 5, how comfortable do you feel discussing your emotions and mental health with friends, family, or support networks?
